properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the container service. You can configure the default using `az configure --defaults acs=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: DisableBrowser
properties.help: Do not open browser after opening a proxy to the cluster web user interface.

properties.name: SshKeyFile
properties.help: If set a path to an SSH key to use, only applies to DCOS.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the container service. You can configure the default using `az configure --defaults acs=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: AdminPassword
properties.help: The adminstration password for Windows nodes. Only available if --windows=true.

properties.name: AdminUsername
properties.help: User name for the Linux Virtual Machines.

properties.name: AgentOsdiskSize
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. Set the default disk size for agent pools vms. Unit in GB. Default: corresponding vmsize disk size.

properties.name: AgentPorts
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. Set the default ports exposed on the agent pools. Only usable for non-Kubernetes. Default: 8080,4000,80.

properties.name: AgentProfiles
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. The file or dictionary representation of the agent profiles. Note it will override any agent settings once set.

properties.name: AgentStorageProfile
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. Set default storage profile for agent pools. Default: varies based on Orchestrator.

properties.name: AgentVmSize
properties.help: Set the default size for agent pools vms.

properties.name: AgentVnetSubnetId
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. Set the default custom vnet subnet id for agent pools. Note agent need to used the same vnet if master set. Default: "".

properties.name: ApiVersion
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. Use API version of ACS to perform az acs operations. Available options: 2017-01-31, 2017-07-01. Default: the latest version for the location.

properties.name: DnsPrefix
properties.help: Sets the Domain name prefix for the cluster. The concatenation of the domain name and the regionalized DNS zone make up the fully qualified domain name associated with the public IP address.

properties.name: GenerateSshKeys
properties.help: Generate SSH public and private key files if missing.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: MasterCount
properties.help: The number of masters for the cluster.

properties.name: MasterFirstConsecutiveStaticIp
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. The first consecutive ip used to specify static ip block.

properties.name: MasterOsdiskSize
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. The disk size for master pool vms. Unit in GB. Default: corresponding vmsize disk size.

properties.name: MasterProfile
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. The file or dictionary representation of the master profile. Note it will override any master settings once set.

properties.name: MasterStorageProfile
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. Default: varies based on Orchestrator.

properties.name: MasterVmSize
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2.

properties.name: MasterVnetSubnetId
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. The custom vnet subnet id. Note agent need to used the same vnet if master set. Default: "".

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: OrchestratorType
properties.help: The type of orchestrator used to manage the applications on the cluster.

properties.name: OrchestratorVersion
properties.help: Feature in preview, only in canadacentral, canadaeast, centralindia, koreasouth, koreacentral, southindia, uksouth, ukwest, westcentralus, westindia, westus2. Use Orchestrator Version to specify the semantic version for your choice of orchestrator.

properties.name: SshKeyValue
properties.help: Configure all linux machines with the SSH RSA public key string.  Your key should include three parts, for example 'ssh-rsa AAAAB...snip...UcyupgH azureuser@linuxvm.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Validate
properties.help: Generate and validate the ARM template without creating any resources.

properties.name: Windows
properties.help: If true, set the default osType of agent pools to be Windows.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the container service. You can configure the default using `az configure --defaults acs=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Created
properties.help: Wait until created with 'provisioningState' at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Custom
properties.help: Wait until the condition satisfies a custom JMESPath query. E.g. provisioningState!='InProgress', instanceView.statuses[?code=='PowerState/running'].

properties.name: Deleted
properties.help: Wait until deleted.

properties.name: Exists
properties.help: Wait until the resource exists.

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: Polling interval in seconds.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Maximum wait in seconds.

properties.name: Updated
properties.help: Wait until updated with provisioningState at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the container service. You can configure the default using `az configure --defaults acs=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: DisableBrowser
properties.help: Do not open browser after opening a proxy to the cluster web user interface.

properties.help: Name of the container service. You can configure the default using `az configure --defaults acs=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: File
properties.help: Where to install the kubectl config file.

properties.help: Path to an SSH key file to use.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
